content:
That's great! It's wonderful that you've been keeping in touch with your friends regularly. There's nothing like catching up in person, though! I'm sure you'll have an amazing time with Rachel and Chris, sharing stories, laughing, and making new memories together.

It's also lovely that you're making an effort to nurture your friendships despite the distance. Maintaining long-distance friendships can be challenging, but it's clear that you value your relationships with Rachel and Chris.

I'm sure they're just as excited to see you and catch up in person. You must be counting down the days until your trip!
